argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_indir | |- ( ( A u. B ) i^i _I ) = ( ( A i^i _I ) u. ( B i^i _I ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dmeqi | |- dom ( ( A u. B ) i^i _I ) = dom ( ( A i^i _I ) u. ( B i^i _I ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dmun | |- dom ( ( A i^i _I ) u. ( B i^i _I ) ) = ( dom ( A i^i _I ) u. dom ( B i^i _I ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqtri | |- dom ( ( A u. B ) i^i _I ) = ( dom ( A i^i _I ) u. dom ( B i^i _I ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-fix | |- Fix ( A u. B ) = dom ( ( A u. B ) i^i _I ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-fix | |- Fix A = dom ( A i^i _I ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-fix | |- Fix B = dom ( B i^i _I ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_uneq12i | |- ( Fix A u. Fix B ) = ( dom ( A i^i _I ) u. dom ( B i^i _I ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 5, 8 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- Fix ( A u. B ) = ( Fix A u. Fix B ) |
